item.description:
Let's get a couple more beach days in before the end of summer weather!!

 

This time, Aaron (or as some of you may know him,  the watermelon guy) has offered up his beach side apartment right around the corner for a couple drinks after the game for anyone who wants to join. Feel free to bring something or chip in for beers etc..  

 

 

We will be close to where the permanent net is set up. Its about a 15 min. walk from the JFK MBTA stop.

This will be an "intermediate and up" level meetup. It will be outdoors on sand and most likely be 6's.  Intermediate level means: Players with firm understanding of game strategy. Should have a good grasp of skills (passing, setting, hitting) and be able to move around to cover areas of the court. 

In intermediate level it is expected that you know the difference between legal/illegal touches/hits/carries. We do not usually run formations however, 5-1 etc...

 

As always, please remember:

- Respect the RSVP system (Don't show up expecting to play if you don't have an RSVP)

- If it looks like you won't be able to make it or will run late please cancel your RSVP in time for someone else to join
item.name: Intermediate Volleyball at Carson Beach
